import React from 'react' import { FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa' import { useContext } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Card from './shared/Card' import FeedbackContext from '../context/FeedbackContext' function FeedbackItem({ item }) { return (
{item.rating}
{item.text}
 ) } FeedbackItem.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default FeedbackItem
